ygData.subject: RE: New Patch
ygData.msgSnippet: hahah yeah....even with the slew of patches Daggerfall had it NEVER was bug free. ... From: Mr. J Daniels [mailto:warpig@one.net] Sent: Wednesday, September
ygData.messageBody:
hahah yeah....even with the slew of patches Daggerfall had it NEVER was bug
free.

-----Original Message-----
From: Mr. J Daniels [mailto:warpig@...]
Sent: Wednesday, September 15, 1999 12:52 PM
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] New Patch


From: "Mr. J Daniels" <warpig@...>

Heheh, what a perfect example of a game that ships bug free. LOL.

> If you want a game that never changes, do not play an online game. Buy one
> of the off the shelf games. Daggerfall. Or something like taht. Online
games
> will change on you.
>
> ===================================================
> Sarah sarah@...
> ===================================================
> My picture of the world is of masses of people extending gifts to other
> people, doing favors -- but nobody keeping score. -- Dr. Whitsett
